tool_description: Evaluates specific damage types and severity on returned items to determine impact on resale value and refund eligibility.

item_id.description: Unique identifier for the item being assessed

damage_severity.description: Overall damage severity: none, minor, moderate, major, severe

error_messages: Invalid item_id: Item ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid damage_types: Each damage type must be a valid string descriptor.
Invalid damage_severity: Severity must be one of [none, minor, moderate, major, severe].
Inconsistent assessment: Damage severity must align with reported damage types.
usage: Use after item inspection to assess specific damage. Provide detailed damage types and overall severity assessment.

damage_score.description: Numerical damage score from 0-100 (0 = no damage)

resale_eligibility.description: Whether item can be resold as is

value_reduction_percent.description: Percentage reduction in item value due to damage
